about_the_game:
Story:

Scraptail: Down the Drain is a third-person heist game with RPG elements taking place in a pre-steampunk universe, where you sneak, steal and assassinate your way through Sewer City as Vivian, an up and coming thief that receives extraordinary help after having an extraordinary accident caused by an extraordinary foe.

Sewer City Needs You!
B.B. Whiskers is hiding a dark secret, and will do anything to keep it that way. Help Vivian stop his plans, before Sewer City falls prey to his schemes. Start your journey in Filthgate, the slums of the Underground, and steal your way up bigger and bigger heists, until you rob the Sewer elite blind.

Key Features:

  • Play Your Own Way
    Evil or Good? Quiet or Loud? Progress through the story with Vivian as you decide the type of thief she will be. A quiet shadow lurking in the dark that kills no one? An assassin that slowly instils a fear of the dark across Sewer City? Or a force to be reckoned with that could hit with a bang at any second? You decide!

  • Survive and Adapt
    The world will adapt to your choices, evolving to protect itself from your chosen playstyle. No heist is the same, every attack will have random structures and events! Spread Chaos across Sewer City, forcing the Elites to arm their soldiers with the finest weapons. Or lay low and spend some extra cash to build a fake of your target, leaving the Elites unaware that anything has even been stolen.

  • Start the Steampunk Era the Right Away
    Upgrade Vivian and her tail across a variety of skill trees. Help Doc recover precious information and tech that will allow him to develop more tails, weapons and gadgets as The Underground discovers the Steampunk Era.

  • Be the Master Thief
    Collect as much loot as possible in each heist, and use it to decorate your hideout or sell it for some extra cash. Soon enough, the entirety of Sewer City's riches will be tucked away in your little nook, and there's nothing anyone can do to stop you.

content_descriptors.notes: In Scraptail, you are a thief tasked with stealing and sabotaging several establishments. You may also choose a playstyle that incentivises you to harm and/or kill other people in-game.

short_description: Join Vivian, The Rat, on her journey to become the greatest thief The Underground has ever seen. Upgrade your equipment and her bionic tail to help you with all the dangers that fill Sewer City.
